name: Warp-Words
description:
Help our little space man to escape from the planet of words completing the word WARP as many times as possible ! If you miss 4 letters you will be sent back to the past and the world will start to distort in the process.

There are 3 levels so far. Enjoy :)

Controls :

WASD and Right Mouse Button to shoot (there's little issue with Left button :) )
